Guidance

Manage your apprenticeships: set up and maintain your accounts

Updated Updated 4 October 2016

Contents

  1. Manage your team
  2. Accessing funds using your PAYE schemes

Use the following guidance to set up and use your apprenticeship levy account.

Manage your team

You can assign different people to do different tasks within your account.

Account owner

If you set up the account, youâ€™re the account owner.

The account owner can:

  • start and stop apprenticeships
  • start and stop payments
  • sign new contracts with training providers
  • view all financial information, such as current balances and forecasts
  • add or remove PAYE schemes from the account
  • manage who has access to the account and what they can do
  • sign an SFA agreement on behalf of each organisation that has an account

The account owner needs to sign the SFA agreement before the account can be used to hire apprentices. The SFA agreement is a legal agreement that the account owner must sign on behalf of the organisation using the account. The SFA agreement must be signed in order for you to spend levy funds. â€¨

People to manage apprenticeships

As the account owner, you can invite people to manage apprenticeships and payments within the account

These people can:

  • start and stop apprenticeships
  • start and stop payments
  • sign new contracts with training providers
  • view all financial information, such as current balances and forecasts

View only access

As the account owner, you can invite people to view all financial aspects of the account. They wonâ€™t be able to change any information on the account.

Accessing funds using your PAYE schemes

You need to add a PAYE to your account to claim funding from that PAYE scheme. You can set up your account using one or multiple PAYE schemes.

Using multiple PAYE schemes

You need to choose:

  • which PAYE schemes you'll use to claim levy funds
  • which of your organisations will spend these funds and hire apprentices

Examples:

One PAYE scheme and one organisation

You can add your PAYE scheme to the account, and add the organisation or company you want to send the funding to.

3 PAYE schemes and 1 organisation

You can add 3 PAYE schemes to the account, and add the organisation or company you want to send the funding to.

3 PAYE schemes and 3 organisations

You can add 3 PAYE schemes to the account, and add whichever 3 organisations or companies you want to send the funding to.

6 PAYE schemes and 3 organisations

You can add 6 PAYE schemes to the account, and add whichever 3 organisations or companies you want to send the funding to.
